THmisc 1.0.0
  • Reference

    Reference

    All functions

    add_cluster_infos()

    Adds a 'cluster' id to a mutation data frame

    annotate_mutation_types()

    Create detailed mutation annotation.

    annotation_from_barcode()

    Get sample annotations from sample barcodes.

    annotation_from_barcode_epicc()

    EPICC Project: Get sample annotations from sample barcodes.

    annotation_from_barcode_tcga()

    TCGA project: Create a annotation for a vector of TCGA barcodes.

    calc_avg_cn_per_bin()

    Calculate average copy-number values in bins.

    calc_cn_summary_stats()

    Calculate copy-number alteration summary stats

    calc_pga_stats()

    Calculate PGA stats

    drop_multiallelic()

    Function to drop multiallelic sites from VCFs

    gene_lists

    List of genes for various analysis

    get_ab_alleles()

    Get A&B allele numbers from a list of CN data.

    get_cnas()

    Get CN annotations from a list of cn data.

    get_gene_pos()

    Function to look-up (average) gene positions.

    get_mutation_df()

    Get a data frame of mutation from various input formats

    get_mutation_type()

    Get the mutation type of mutations

    get_transition_type()

    Get the transition type of mutations

    indentify_vcf_type()

    Function to identify which tool created a given vcf file

    insert_ccf()

    Adds an additional CCF entry to a 'CollapsedVCF' object.

    insert_cnas()

    Add an additional CNA and AB entries to a 'CollapsedVCF' object.

    insert_vaf()

    Adds an additional VAF entry to a 'CollapsedVCF' object.

    lift_data_wrapper()

    Internal function used to lift mutation data between genome versions.

    lift_hg19_to_hg38()

    Function to lift mutations or objects between genome versions

    lift_hg38_to_hg19()

    Function to lift mutations or objects between genome versions

    load_sequenza_purity_files()

    Convience function to load Sequenza fit files.

    load_sequenza_segment_files()

    Convience function to load Sequenza segment files.

    load_vcf_file()

    Wrapper function to load arbitrary VCF files.

    long_to_short_peptide_names()

    Convert long peptide names to short ones.

    plot_cn_altered_per_patient()

    Plot per-case copy-number alteration summary stats

    plot_cn_freq()

    Plot copy-number alteration summary stats across cases

    plot_cn_states_across_samples()

    Plot CN states of somatic sides across samples.

    plot_driver_vaf_heatmap() save_driver_vaf_heatmap()

    Plot a heatmap showing VAF of specific mutations across samples.

    plot_gene_mut_heatmap()

    Create a plot showing if a gene is mutated in a given sample

    plot_inter_mutation_distance()

    Function to plot intermutation distances

    plot_mutation_heatmap()

    Function to plot mutation data as a heatmap

    plot_mutation_histogram()

    Function to plot mutation data as a histogram

    plot_pga_stats()

    Plot PGA stats

    plot_vaf_distribution()

    Plot a histogram of mutations contained in a VCF across CN states.

    pretty_violin()

    GGplot layer to plot a violing plot

    split_multiallelic()

    Function to split multiallelic sites into multiple variants

    vcf_to_data_frame()

    Convert a VCF to a data.frame containing key statistics

    window_list_from_genome()

    Creates a data.frame of named tiles from a BSgenome object
